summary: Two guys take a trip of several months on motorcycles. They travel from the North of Scotland, down through Europe, into Africa, finally winding up in Cape Town, South Africa.
cast: Ewan McGregor|Charley Boorman|David Alexanian|Russ Malkin|Jimmy Simak|Jim Foster|Dai Jones|Nuri Lamin|Claudio von Planta|Robert Adams|Oliver Blackwell|Doone Boorman|Kinvara Boorman|Olly Boorman|Joanna Ford|Fares Haddad|Jamie Lowther-Pinkerton|Asia Mackay|Emily Malkin|Eve Mavrakis|Ian Maxwell|Charlie McGrath|Carol McGregor|Colin McGregor|Jim McGregor|Ray Mears|Barbara Osborne|Gladstone Robinson|Ramy Romany|Nebil Tebourbi|Lucy Trujillo
director: Creators: David Alexanian, Charley Boorman, Russ Malkin | 1 more credit »
title: El mundo en moto con Ewan McGregor, la aventura continúa
